## Advanced Download Management

**Phase:** Phase 5 - Advanced Integration & Ecosystem
**Timeline:** 6-8 weeks
**Section:** 5.3

### Goal
Expand integration ecosystem and platform capabilities

### Impact
Completes download management vision

### Effort Estimate
2 weeks

### Priority
P2

### Tasks

- [ ] Complete Epic 4 stories (4.1-4.6)
- [ ] Add automatic quality selection
- [ ] Implement download scheduling
- [ ] Create bandwidth throttling controls
- [ ] Add duplicate detection improvements
- [ ] Implement music tagging and organization

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All tasks completed
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] Tests passing (unit + integration)
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No regressions in existing functionality
